post:
CFG.CO.IN KVM & SSD Based VPS
=================================
---------------------------------------------------------

Couple of days back we launched our beta testing program exclusively for LET/LEB members. We got great response and  ( Thanks to beta testers) who helped us doing load testing .   

KVM VPS Plans
---------------
KVM-384MBRAM-3GBSSD  
384 MB Ram  
KVM/Solus VM  
1 Core CPU ( 2.2 GHz)  
3 GB SSD   
3 GB FTP Space For Backups.  
200 GB Bandwidth  
1 IPv4  
100 Mbps Port  
Weekly Backups  
Price= $4.49 ( Use 10% discount Coupon "launch10")  
Click here to[Order](http://billing.cfg.co.in/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=1)  


KVM-768MBRAM-5GBSSD 
768 MB Ram  
KVM/Solus VM  
2 Core CPU ( 2 x 2.2 GHz)  
5 GB SSD  
5 GB FTP Space For Backups.  
500 GB Bandwidth  
1 IPv4  
100 Mbps Port  
Weekly Backups  
Price= $6.49 ( Use 10% discount Coupon "launch10")  
Click here to [Order](http://billing.cfg.co.in/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=2)  



### Extra Information
- Own ISO Allowed.  
- Cpanel for $12 extra.  
- Extra IPv4 $1 extra.  
- 500 mbps Port Upgrade on request. ( After order raise a ticket)
- If you have some custom requirement then please let us know.
- FTP space is located on another server so that in case if something really bad happens , we always have the backups to restore from. 
- FTP Backups are maintained by the user. 
- We only make weekly backups.

###Contact Info

- Offical Website [CFG.CO.IN](http://billing.cfg.co.in/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=2)

- Sales Ticket [Click Here](http://billing.cfg.co.in/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1)  
- We know our site does not look that great. We have someone on board to make it look more professional.   
- Check Ping Here [Click Me To Check Ping](http://billing.cfg.co.in/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=3)
